data.message: FB sent me a msg after helping me with a 'hacked' acct & I can't find it. I know there was a deadline for something & I need to touch base----can you tell me how to contact them online?

replies.message: Hey Nance. If you think someone has logged into your account without your permission, we recommend that you secure it right away. Learn how: http://on.fb.me/1D2oitc. -Abby
Thx Abby for the info, but what I need is a way to connect with the dept that sent me a msg about their results after installing a security program by Teir Three Tech's.
